title: How the world made us
itunes:title: How the world made us
itunes:subtitle: Lewis Dartnell discusses how Earth’s physical features have had a profound effect on human civilisations throughout history. Historyextra.com/podcast
description:
Scientist and author Lewis Dartnell discusses his recent book Origins, which explores how Earth’s physical features have had a profound effect on human civilisations throughout history. Historyextra.com/podcast

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
